hanzi-su-wiki:
飽

Значения

Пресыщаться, наскучить; пресыщать, надоедать, утомлять

Мнемоника

Набивать свою утробу 包 едой 食 — насыщаться.

Варианты

饱
purpleculture_pinyin:
bǎo
to eat till full; satisfied
съесть досыта; довольный
rtega_mnemonic:
飽飽RS
饱饱		eat to the full, sated, tired of, bored, satiate
  • embrace 包 food 飠 fully: become satiated
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 饱)
Antonyms: 餓
Pictophonetic: 包 indicates the sound; 飠 (food) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
飽滿 [ bǎo mǎn ]: full; plump
飽和 [ bǎo hé ]: saturation
飽含 [ bǎo hán ]: to be full of (emotion); to brim with (love, tears etc)
飽受 [ bǎo shòu ]: to endure; to suffer; to be subjected to
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 飠 [ shí ] food; to eat
    • 包 [ bāo ] wrap, pack, bundle; package
heisig_chinese_memo: My gluttony was only sated after I had eaten the hamburger AND the wrapper!
heisig_constituent: sated, eat, food, umbrella, good, halo, drop, silver, wrap, bound up, snake, self
koohiiStory1: My gluttony was only sated after I ate the hamburger AND the wrapper!
koohiiStory2: This guy is sated only after eating the hamburger AND its wrapping!
jp_example_words:
飽和(ほうわ): saturation
飽きる(あきる): get tired of, lose interest in
飽くまで(あくまで): to the end, stubbornly, persistently
jp_readingExamples: 飽かす (あ.かす), 飽きる (あ.きる)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You eat and then wrap yourself into a ball because you're bored. You're also sated, because you ate just the right amount, but now you have nothing to do and it's soooo booooring.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Haven't you ever been so bored that you just wrapped yourself up into a boredom ball?
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: So now you're bored and stuck at home (ほう). You aren't hungry. There's nothing on TV. And you don't want to have to leave your home to do something, even though that would probably solve your boredom problem.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Ehhhhhhgggg guys I'm stuck at home and I'm soooo bored. Heeelpp!
Ru_trainchinese:
bǎo: (прил/глаг) полный, сытый; удовлетворять
bǎo: (графема) растрачивать; полностью
Kanshudo_mnemonic: eating (飠) wrapped (包) food - you grow weary of it
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Put a tasty food wrap in front of me and I can't be sated.  I'll ask you where you got it so I can go eat another one.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " food " and " bag ", the original meaning is to eat enough. "Said Wen": "Satisfaction, 猒 also. From food, Baosheng. 𩜿, the ancient text is full from 𤓽. 𩛁, also the ancient text is full from the sound." "猒" has the meaning of satisfaction, see "猒". "Shu‧Liujiao": "Er Nai is drunk and full."

" Satisfaction " also means to eat enough. "Mozi·Lu Wen": "Those who can't satisfy the world's hunger can be seen if you think that you can get a liter of millet."

" Full " can be extended to meet. "Poetry. Daya. Drunk": "Drunk with wine, and full with virtue."

" Satisfaction " also specifically refers to full energy and high morale. "Eighteen Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Gong Xi": "Remembering the benefits and resignation, with the excitement, I am straightforward; the people are full, not old."

" Full " also means fullness. Song Su Shi's "Ci Yun Shen Chief Officer" third: "The wind comes to shake Zefan's fullness, and the rain enters the Songjiang River and the water gradually becomes fat."

In modern Chinese, " fullness " also specifically refers to animals that are plump and plump. Qing Li Yu's "Shen Luan Intercourse-Ruthless Picture": "He will have no clothes to wear on his body and eat in his mouth on the second day. I'm afraid he won't come to find you. Then you will call out fake mercy and be a hungry cat and save the rat. Loan, the indispensable thing will come."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " food " and " bag ", the original meaning is to eat enough.
humanum_full_description:
從「食」，「包」聲，本義為吃足。《說文》：「飽，猒也。从食，包聲。𩜿，古文飽从𤓽。𩛁，亦古文飽从卯聲。」「猒」有滿足之義，參見「猒」。《書‧酒誥》：「爾乃飲食醉飽。」

　　「飽」也指使吃足。《墨子‧魯問》：「籍而以為得一升粟，其不能飽天下之飢者，既可睹矣。」

　　「飽」可引申為滿足。《詩‧大雅‧既醉》：「既醉以酒，既飽以德。」

　　「飽」也特指精神足，士氣盛。《左傳‧僖公十八年》：「背惠食言，以亢其讎，我曲楚直；其眾素飽，不可謂老。」

　　「飽」還表示飽滿。宋蘇軾〈次韻沈長官〉之三：「風來震澤帆初飽，雨入松江水漸肥。」

　　近代漢語中「飽」亦特指指動物豐滿肥壯。清李漁《慎鸞交‧狠圖》：「他到第二日身上沒得穿，口裏沒得吃，怕他不來尋你，你到那時節呼假慈哀，做個飢貓救鼠相貸，少不的飽兔償鷹自會來。」

從「 食 」，「 包 」聲，本義為吃足。《說文》：「飽，猒也。从食，包聲。𩜿，古文飽从𤓽。𩛁，亦古文飽从卯聲。」「 猒 」有滿足之義，參見「 猒 」。《書‧酒誥》：「爾乃飲食醉飽。」 「 飽 」也指使吃足。《墨子‧魯問》：「籍而以為得一升粟，其不能飽天下之飢者，既可睹矣。」 「 飽 」可引申為滿足。《詩‧大雅‧既醉》：「既醉以酒，既飽以德。」 「 飽 」也特指精神足，士氣盛。《左傳‧僖公十八年》：「背惠食言，以亢其讎，我曲楚直；其眾素飽，不可謂老。」 「 飽 」還表示飽滿。宋蘇軾〈次韻沈長官〉之三：「風來震澤帆初飽，雨入松江水漸肥。」 近代漢語中「 飽 」亦特指指動物豐滿肥壯。清李漁《慎鸞交‧狠圖》：「他到第二日身上沒得穿，口裏沒得吃，怕他不來尋你，你到那時節呼假慈哀，做個飢貓救鼠相貸，少不的飽兔償鷹自會來。」
From the sound of " food" and " bag", the original meaning is to eat enough. "Said Wen": "Satisfaction, 猒 also. From food, Baosheng. 𩜿, the ancient text is full from 𤓽. 𩛁, also the ancient text is full from the sound." " 猒" has the meaning of satisfaction, see " 猒". "Shu‧Liujiao": "Er Nai is drunk and full." " Satisfaction" also means to eat enough. "Mozi·Lu Wen": "Those who can't satisfy the world's hunger can be seen if you think that you can get a liter of millet." " Full" can be extended to meet. "Poetry. Daya. Drunk": "Drunk with wine, and full with virtue." " Satisfaction" also specifically refers to full energy and high morale. "Eighteen Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Gong Xi": "Remembering the benefits and resignation, with the excitement, I am straightforward; the people are full, not old." " Full" also means fullness. Song Su Shi's "Ci Yun Shen Chief Officer" third: "The wind comes to shake Zefan's fullness, and the rain enters the Songjiang River and the water gradually becomes fat." In modern Chinese, " fullness" also specifically refers to animals that are plump and plump. Qing Li Yu's "Shen Luan Intercourse-Ruthless Picture": "He will have no clothes to wear on his body and eat in his mouth on the second day. I'm afraid he won't come to find you. Then you will call out fake mercy and be a hungry cat and save the rat. Loan, the indispensable thing will come."

飽字的基本解释

飽
bǎo
见“饱”。

飽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bǎo］
［《廣韻》博巧切，上巧，幫。］
“饱1”的繁体字。
(1)满足了食量。
(2)使吃足。
(3)满足。
(4)充足；充分。
(5)特指精神足，士气盛。
(6)饱满。
(7)特指动物丰满肥壮。
(8)姓。宋代有饱安盈。见《万姓统谱·巧韵》。

飽字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【食字部】　飽； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1418第38
〔古文〕???【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?博巧切，包上聲。【說文】厭也。【玉篇】飽滿也。【廣韻】食多也。【易·漸卦】飮食衎衎，不素飽也。【禮·文王世子】嘗饌善，則世子亦能食。嘗饌寡，世子亦不能飽。　又【陸機·豪士賦】心翫居常之安，耳飽從諛之說。又姓。【正字通】宋添差通判臨江軍事飽安盈。　又【五音集韻】許旣切，音欷。飫也。　又古通有韻。【詩·小雅】牂羊墳首，三星在罶。人可以食，鮮可以飽。　又叶彼五切，音補。【吳子·治兵篇】適其水草，節其飢飽。冬則溫廐，夏則凉廡。

考證：〔【禮·文王世子】嘗饌善，則世子亦能食。嘗饌寡，則世子亦不能飽。〕　謹照原文嘗饌寡下省則字。

小篆楷体

字形对比：

飽字的起名意思

暂无。

full
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bǎo］
["Guang Yun" Bo Qiao cut, Shang Qiao, help. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "Squad 1".
(1) The appetite is satisfied.
(2) Enough to eat.
(3) Satisfaction.
(4) Sufficient; sufficient.
(5) Especially refers to the spirit and morale.
(6) Full.
(7) Especially the animals are plump and plump.
(8) Last name. In the Song Dynasty, there was fullness and peace. See "Wan Surnamed Genealogy·Qiao Yun".
full
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Food Character Department】　Full; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1418 Page 38
〔古文〕???【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Club】【Zheng Yun】? Bo skillfully cut, wrap up the sound. [Said the text] I'm tired of it. [Jade articles] It's full. [Guang Yun] There is plenty of food. [Easy·Jian Gua] If you eat stubbornly, you are not full. 【Rite·Wen Wang Shi Zi】If you taste good food, you will be able to eat too. If you have a few foods, the world can't be full.　[Lu Ji·Haoshi Fu] The heart is always at peace, and the ears are full of flattery. Another surname. [Zhengzitong] Song Tianchai sent a sentence to Linjiang's military to be full.　[Five-tone Collection Rhyme] Xu Yiqie, Yinju.饫 also.　It is ancient and has rhyme. [Poetry·Xiaoya] The head of the sheep's grave, the three stars are in the scorpion. People can eat, fresh and full.　Five cuts with five leaves, sound complement. 【Wu Zi·Government of Soldiers】It is suitable for water plants and saves hunger and satiety. It is warm in winter and cool in summer. Textual research: [[Rite·Wen Wang Shizi] If you taste good delicacies, the shizi can eat too. If there are few delicacies, the world will not be full. 〕 　 I would like to try the original word for the delicacy according to the original text.

вм. 饱
Radicals: 食, 包  (eat, wrap)
Meaning Mnemonic
You eat and then wrap yourself into a ball because you're bored. You're also sated, because you ate just the right amount, but now you have nothing to do and it's soooo booooring.
Haven't you ever been so bored that you just wrapped yourself up into a boredom ball?
Reading Mnemonic
So now you're bored and stuck at home (ほう). You aren't hungry. There's nothing on TV. And you don't want to have to leave your home to do something, even though that would probably solve your boredom problem.
Ehhhhhhgggg guys I'm stuck at home and I'm soooo bored. Heeelpp!
